## Methods

N = 7 participants with kidney biopsy from PB90 single-cell RNA sequencing (scRNAseq) dataset.

n = 3 Lean Controls (LC) from CROCODILE study.

n = 4 Type 2 Diabetes (T2D) from Renal-HEIR study.

Total cells = 14,348; Total Genes = 9,160 after quality control.

## Code

When you click the **Render** button a presentation will be generated that includes both content and the output of embedded code. You can embed code like this:

```{r}
library(knitr)

# Extract R code from RMarkdown
knitr::purl("Kidney_Organoid_Lambda2.Rmd", output = "extracted_code.R")

# Source the extracted code
source("extracted_code.R")
```
